rows.label: tev000795_MSG0001
rows.name: Is that you, [ST:playername ]?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000795_MSG0002
rows.name:
We were just discussing what to do with all the stuff
that Lao left behind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000795_MSG0003
rows.name: His rifle... His protective gear...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000795_MSG0004
rows.name: Shirts... Jacket... Bed... Blankets...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000795_MSG0005
rows.name:
A bottle of expensive liquor and a framed photo
of his family...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000795_MSG0006
rows.name:
Saiden and Shingo might get their old bodies back
and come home one day, so their stuff is fine.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000795_MSG0007
rows.name: But Lao...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000795_MSG0008
rows.name: Anyway, what do you think we should do with it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000795_JNK0010
rows.name: Dispose

rows.label: tev000795_SEL0011
rows.name: Suggest it be thrown away.

rows.label: tev000795_JNK0020
rows.name: Keep

rows.label: tev000795_SEL0021
rows.name: Suggest that Doug leave everything alone.

rows.label: tev000795_JNK0030
rows.name: Plunder

rows.label: tev000795_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Doug if you can have the booze.

rows.label: tev000795_MSG0009
rows.name: Oof. That's some harsh judgment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000795_MSG0010
rows.name: The director general said the same thing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000795_MSG0011
rows.name:
He thought there was a possible danger from Ganglion
items that might be mixed in with his personal effects.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000795_MSG0012
rows.name:
And he also wanted to clear the room for a new
BLADE recruit.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000795_MSG0013
rows.name: But just tossing all this stuff seems so...sad.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000795_MSG0014
rows.name: I think I'm going to have it stored somewhere.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000795_MSG0015
rows.name:
That was actually Vandham's suggestion, so it should
be good enough for now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000795_MSG0016
rows.name: Still, I think I may just hold on to this picture.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000795_MSG0017
rows.name: Yeah, I know what you mean.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000795_MSG0018
rows.name: I wish we could do that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000795_MSG0019
rows.name:
I know that if he ever was able to come home,
he'd really appreciate all his stuff still being here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000795_MSG0020
rows.name: But the BLADE barracks are crowded enough as it is.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000795_MSG0021
rows.name:
And we need to clear out his room so that another
BLADE can use it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000795_MSG0022
rows.name:
We can't afford to turn the room of every fallen BLADE
into a shrine.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000795_MSG0023
rows.name:
I wonder if it'd be okay if I took all his stuff and had
it stored somewhere...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000795_MSG0024
rows.name: At the very least, I'll hang on to that photo for him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000795_MSG0025
rows.name: Are you serious?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000795_MSG0026
rows.name: Come on. This is no time to be joking around.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000795_MSG0027
rows.name: I was planning to take that booze for myself![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000795_MSG0028
rows.name: Heh heh.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000795_MSG0029
rows.name: ...Seriously, would you mind if I took it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000795_MSG0030
rows.name:
The rest of this stuff will probably all be seized and
disposed of one way or the other.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000795_MSG0031
rows.name:
But I could hold on to the bottle for him,
and then if he ever did come back...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000795_MSG0032
rows.name: I dunno. Maybe me and him could drink it together.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000795_MSG0033
rows.name: I should probably hang on to that photo, too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000795_MSG0034
rows.name: Look how happy his family looks...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000795_MSG0035
rows.name:
We all left our families behind when we boarded the
White Whale.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000795_MSG0036
rows.name:
And don't take this the wrong way, but we can't allow
ourselves to forget that we bear a great responsibility
to those we sacrificed in order to reach this planet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000795_MSG0037
rows.name:
I'm going to work hard to honor Lao and his family.
And I'll do it by fighting to survive here on Mira![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000795_MSG0038
rows.name: I hope you'll help me in this endeavor.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000795_MSG0039
rows.name:
Speaking of which, I think you should take his weapon
and armor. That's better than letting them go to waste.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000795_MSG0040
rows.name:
Don't worry. If just a couple of things go missing,
I'll get chewed out and that'll be the end of it.[ST:wait ]
